page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I USUALLY GET UP AT 7AM., GET DRESSED FOR SCHOOL AND RUN DOWNSTAIRS. I UNLOCK THE BACK DOOR, PUTTING ON MY RIDING BOOTS. I RUN TO MY PONY'S STABLE, GRAB HIS HEADCOLLAR AND THEN RUN ALONG TO THE GATE OF HIS FIELD, WHERE I CALL HIM TO ME. I THEN TAKE HIM ALONG TO HIS STABLE TO BRUSH HIM. THEN I GO INSIDE FOR MY BREAKFAST. READY FOR SCHOOL, I GO TO THE BOTTOM OF THE FARM ROAD WITH MY LITTLE BROTHER TO CATCH THE SCHOOL BUS. WE ARE IN SCHOOL FROM 9AM. TILL 3.15PM. WITH 1 HOUR FOR LUNCH. SOMETIMES I TAKE A PACKED LUNCH OR I MAY HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS. I WORK AT LANGUAGE, MATHS, ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES, MUSIC, ART OR P.E. BEFORE TEA, I RIDE MY PONY. AFTER TEA, I DO MY HOMEWORK AND AM READY FOR BED BY 8.30PM.
